builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of a notification mechanism
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generate change listener
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateChangeListener

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of java 5 enumeration types
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Use Java enum types
builderSetPropertyDef.name: useJavaEnumTypes

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of java 5 generices for collections
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Use typesafe collections
builderSetPropertyDef.name: useTypesafeCollections

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of a delta determining mechanism for model objects
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generate delta support
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateDeltaSupport

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of a model copy mechanism
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generate copy support
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateCopySupport

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of visitor code
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generate visitor support
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateVisitorSupport

builderSetPropertyDef.description: The language in which the code and documentation is generated. Currently supported are the values de and en.
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generator Language
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generatorLocale

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of JAXB support
builderSetPropertyDef.label: Generate JAXB support
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateJaxbSupport
